tool.name: GWASLab Summary Loader
tool.description: Load and inspect PLINK2 Firth GWAS summary stats
tool.help:
This tool loads a GWAS summary statistics file in PLINK2 Firth format using GWASLab and shows the basic structure of the data.
You must upload a `.csv` file (use `csv` datatype), usually exported from `plink2` like `.glm.firth`.
The tool outputs a summary of columns and data types.
